nodes.text: Xorth was a agriworld located within the Xorth system of the Core Worlds.

Xorth was a world with a rich soil, making it an important agriworld. The planet's trade was largely in agricultural goods. It was noteworthy for being the source of the best farrberries available in the galaxy.
It was at the intersection of the Agricultural Circuit and the Corellian Run.
Xorth joined the Galactic Republic prior to the Indecta Era. During the Alsakan Conflicts, it supported Coruscant.
During the height of the New Order, Xorth was an example of prosperous, secure and growing Imperial Core planet.
